channel.title: Divine Communion (A weekly liturgy for weary & restless souls, longing for renewal)
channel.description:
““Are you tired? Worn out? Burned out on religion? Come to me. Get away with me and you’ll recover your life. I’ll show you how to take a real rest. Walk with me and work with me—watch how I do it. Learn the unforced rhythms of grace. I won’t lay anything heavy or ill-fitting on you. Keep company with me and you’ll learn to live freely and lightly.”” ‭‭Matthew‬ ‭11:28-30‬ ‭MSG‬‬
Religion has gotten in the way of a truly divine communication experience. I’ve been fed up for too long, going through the motions. Join me on the search for a new rhythm. A rhythm of grace and renewal.

image.title: Divine Communion (A weekly liturgy for weary & restless souls, longing for renewal)

channel.author: Sebastian Joseph Harris
channel.itunes:author: Sebastian Joseph Harris
channel.itunes:summary:
““Are you tired? Worn out? Burned out on religion? Come to me. Get away with me and you’ll recover your life. I’ll show you how to take a real rest. Walk with me and work with me—watch how I do it. Learn the unforced rhythms of grace. I won’t lay anything heavy or ill-fitting on you. Keep company with me and you’ll learn to live freely and lightly.”” ‭‭Matthew‬ ‭11:28-30‬ ‭MSG‬‬
Religion has gotten in the way of a truly divine communication experience. I’ve been fed up for too long, going through the motions. Join me on the search for a new rhythm. A rhythm of grace and renewal.

item.title: Week 5: The Restoration of Hope
item.description: Hope deferred makes the heart sick, but a desire fulfilled is a tree of life!
item.dc:creator: Sebastian Joseph Harris
item.itunes:summary: Hope deferred makes the heart sick, but a desire fulfilled is a tree of life!

item.title: Week 6: Receive The Kingdom
item.description: May the Kingdom of Peace, Joy and Righteousness fill the temple of our hearts afresh
item.dc:creator: Sebastian Joseph Harris
item.itunes:summary: May the Kingdom of Peace, Joy and Righteousness fill the temple of our hearts afresh

item.title: Week 4: The Ministry of Reconciliation
item.description: God has given us the ministry of reconciliation! Let’s be aware of how he is reconciling all things to himself this week. Nothing and no one is beyond the reach of his reconciliation!
item.dc:creator: Sebastian Joseph Harris
item.itunes:summary: God has given us the ministry of reconciliation! Let’s be aware of how he is reconciling all things to himself this week. Nothing and no one is beyond the reach of his reconciliation!

item.title: Week 3: Consecration to the Lord
item.description: This week is focused on engaging with a lifestyle of consecration to the Lord. Enjoying his presence from a laid down position!
item.dc:creator: Sebastian Joseph Harris
item.itunes:summary: This week is focused on engaging with a lifestyle of consecration to the Lord. Enjoying his presence from a laid down position!

item.title: Week 2: Celebrating The Lord’s Protection
item.description: This week we are centered around the theme of God’s protection of his people. Join us as we entreat the Lord of Angel Armies!
item.dc:creator: Sebastian Joseph Harris
item.itunes:summary: This week we are centered around the theme of God’s protection of his people. Join us as we entreat the Lord of Angel Armies!

item.title: Week 1: Open Our Eyes, Lord!
item.description: Join us in the first liturgy of 2020, as we join the feasting table of Heaven. All you need to know to engage is to open your heart to God and let him speak to you through the liturgy. Pray that he would illuminate himself in your world this week. Let love win this week!
item.dc:creator: Sebastian Joseph Harris
item.itunes:summary: Join us in the first liturgy of 2020, as we join the feasting table of Heaven. All you need to know to engage is to open your heart to God and let him speak to you through the liturgy. Pray that he would illuminate himself in your world this week. Let love win this week!

item.title: Join Me This Year! (Podcast Trailer)
item.description: Join me in 2020 on a year long project to bring the rhythms of grace and renewal to the forefront of our lives. Available anywhere you listen to podcasts!
item.dc:creator: Sebastian Joseph Harris
item.itunes:summary: Join me in 2020 on a year long project to bring the rhythms of grace and renewal to the forefront of our lives. Available anywhere you listen to podcasts!
